detailsOfAchievement: 1. Establishment of a Textile TPC (training cum production centre) spread across 2,00,000 square feet area in Khanwa Village of Nawada (Bihar) run on solar power grid. 2. Livelihood generation of 500 rural women from above. 3. Establishment of three solar charkha training centers (one in Nawada and two in Varanasi). 4. Technology intervention in Khadi for zero effect and zero defect concept. 5. Marketing platform known as "Greenwear" to promote sustainable fashion.
